title: Video: Avec Sans – Perth (Bon Iver Cover)
body:
How do you know that you’ve successfully made the cross-over from ’emotionally unstable indie demi-god’ to ‘super relevant bro with guitar’? Well, I guess once someone releases a eurodance styled cover of one of your tracks it’s a pretty sound indication that you’re almost there.

This cover of _Perth_ from London duo **Avec Sans** is quirky to say the least, replacing the subtle acoustic guitar of **Bon Iver** with booming synths, rendering the track almost completely unrecognizable. Would I play it to a girl in an attempt to impress her with my admirable sense of emotional dexterity? Probably not, but I’d almost certainly (awkwardly) dance to it.
